title: Seriously, this needs to show up more
body: I this he really needs this whenever he gets a pentakill

replies.body:
Can the announcement of Taric gettting a pentakill be in his somewhat creepy, suave voice instead of the usual one?

I feel like that would be appropriate.
Screw that, we need a whole Taric announcer pack.

> Screw that, we need a whole Taric announcer pack.

Agreed!
